tweets.author: Mega Man
tweets.text:
A brand-new 12th entry in the Mega Man series is on the way!

Get ready to override your limits as Mega Man: Dual Override gears up for release in 2027! Stay tuned for more updates!

#MegaManDO

Try it for yourself.
